moduleMetadataJson.name: Native DNS Spoofer (Example)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module provides a Rex based DNS service to resolve queries intercepted
        via the capture mixin. Configure STATIC_ENTRIES to contain host-name mappings
        desired for spoofing using a hostsfile or space/semicolon separated entries.
        In default configuration, the service operates as a normal native DNS server
        with the exception of consuming from and writing to the wire as opposed to a
        listening socket. Best when compromising routers or spoofing L2 in order to
        prevent return of the real reply which causes a race condition. The method
        by which replies are filtered is up to the user (though iptables works fine).
author: RageLtMan <rageltman@sempervictus>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: INTERFACE
options.description: The name of the interface

options.name: FILTER
options.description: The filter string for capturing traffic

options.name: SNAPLEN
options.description: The number of bytes to capture

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: The number of seconds to wait for new data

options.name: SECRET
options.description: A 32-bit cookie for probe requests.

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST
options.description: Send a TTL=1 random UDP datagram to this host to discover the default gateway's MAC

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_PORT
options.description: The port on GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST to send a random UDP probe to (random if 0 or unset)

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: SSLVerifyMode
options.description: SSL verification method (Accepted: CLIENT_ONCE, FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT, NONE, PEER)

options.name: SSLCipher
options.description: String for SSL cipher - "DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA" or "ADH"

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::max_send_size
options.description: Maxiumum tcp segment size.  (0 = disable)

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The target domain name

options.name: NS
options.description: Specify the nameservers to use for queries, space separated

options.name: SEARCHLIST
options.description: DNS domain search list, comma separated

options.name: THREADS
options.description: Number of threads to use in threaded queries

options.name: DnsClientDefaultNS
options.description: Specify the default to use for queries, space separated

options.name: DnsClientRetry
options.description: Number of times to try to resolve a record if no response is received

options.name: DnsClientRetryInterval
options.description: Number of seconds to wait before doing a retry

options.name: DnsClientReportARecords
options.description: Add hosts found via BRT and RVL to DB

options.name: DnsClientRVLExistingOnly
options.description: Only perform lookups on hosts in DB

options.name: DnsClientTcpDns
options.description: Run queries over TCP

options.name: DnsClientResolvconf
options.description: Resolvconf formatted configuration file to use for Resolver

options.name: SRVHOST
options.description: The local host to listen on for DNS services.

options.name: SRVPORT
options.description: The local port to listen on.

options.name: ListenerComm
options.description: The specific communication channel to use for this service

options.name: STATIC_ENTRIES
options.description: DNS domain search list (hosts file or space/semicolon separate entries)

options.name: DISABLE_RESOLVER
options.description: Disable DNS request forwarding

options.name: DISABLE_NS_CACHE
options.description: Disable DNS response caching

options.name: DnsServerUdp
options.description: Serve UDP DNS requests

options.name: DnsServerTcp
options.description: Serve TCP DNS requests
